Why do I come to these things.

Entries.Rudy_spouse: I hope you town folk can cook.

Entries.Rudy: Well they are some pretty dangerous creatures.
And some people eat them,what a shame.
That clown is a hottie pottatie.
Ehh! I could tell a story way more scarier than this!
Entries.Rudy_spouse: Where I'm from, this is like a tutorial level of scary.

Entries.Rudy: I like the cold, but you can give me your jacket if you want.
If you get 2nd place,at least you tried kid.
I want a very expensive gift.
